document_data.Description: Bellows were typically made from wood and [[calfskin]] with a [[brass]] nozzle.
document_data.Availability:
* ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' sold bellows for around 5–10 [[gold piece]]s depending upon their size.
* [[Ember Me More]], a specialty shop in [[Ravens Bluff]], sold bellows.
document_data.Usages: Besides their use in forges, sizeable bellows were used in [[pipe organ]]s to push air through pipes, thereby producing sound.<ref> And there existed a bellows-powered variant of [[shawm]]s developed by [[Faerûn]]ian [[gnome]]s.
document_data.Notable Users: * Bellows were favored by wizards and craftsmen.
